data.message: Eminem should make more songs about addiction for all the suffering addicts out there. Congrats to you Em if you still clean, you lived a rough life and must be hard listening to all the criticism from people. Seems like the whole world is becoming ugly. Been a fan since i can remember !!!

replies.message: So is that a fake Marshall that liked my comment?
Autumn Fehlberg whoo hoo i'm ecstatic here me too x
Autumn Fehlberg I've actually just screen shot it to save lolx
Jackie i think i got my hopes up to high. ..that profile was made 6 hours ago. And last night when i posted i thought how cool to even get a like from him! Lol

Let me put it this way.. If you were famous, would you create a Facebook profile using your real name? ;) Shit, I'd probably name my profile R2-D2 or something, n' have R2 as a profile picture, lol. Trust me, it's a faker. And if not. Then I owe every single person who posted a comment on this picture a million Dollars.
Oh I figured it out pretty quick. Lol. I had about 2 seconds of omg and then said pretty much everything you just did.
2 seconds of having a heart attack, and then realizing it's an imposter. I feel your pain, lol.
Me too..been a fan for as long as can't remember
